name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy vegetable spring rolls served with sweet chili sauce.

description: Toasted bread slices with garlic butter and herbs.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Golden fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

description: Classic Filipino chicken adobo simmered in soy sauce, vinegar, and garlic.

description: Tender marinated beef strips served with garlic rice and egg.

description: Grilled chicken glazed in teriyaki sauce served over steamed rice.

description: Grilled salmon fillet served with vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

name: Easy Cheesy Beef Chilli Loaded Sweet Potato
